code: import{connect}from"react-redux";import ProductCard from"../Component/CardComponents/ProductCard";import{WishListToCart,RemoveWishList,AddToCart,RemoveToCart}from"../Services/Actions/Actions";var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state,ownProps){return{data:state};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{AddTowishlist:function AddTowishlist(data){return dispatch(WishListToCart(data));},RemoveTowishlist:function RemoveTowishlist(data){return dispatch(RemoveWishList(data));},AddToCartHandler:function AddToCartHandler(data){return dispatch(AddToCart(data));},RemoveToCartHandler:function RemoveToCartHandler(data){return dispatch(RemoveToCart(data));}};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(ProductCard);
